Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Hm? Oh my, I didn't expect to see anyone else out here. ... You're looking for me? But I just got here... Oh, would you look at the time... I guess I got a bit distracted. The woods are jus so lush! I'm $Actor_26$, it's delight to meet you.]

[Text:When I was younger, young men and women from all over would come through here. Adventurers and gloryseekers, looking to make names for themselves. I can see the same fire in you.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Name:ShopOpen]
[Text:Oh look at you, all soaked. Alex, you know you shouldn't go out when it's raining. Go sit by the fire and I'll bring you some stew.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]

[Name:Raining|2][Text:The sound of the rain is pretty isn't it? It always makes me think of when I was younger. My family used to settle in on those rainy nights around the fireplace and tell each other stories. I hope Jesse comes home soon.][Weather:Raining]
[Name:Snowing|1][Text:... hm? Oh, hello dear. I was lost in my thoughts. It's alovely day out, isn't it? My husband and I used to go out for walks on days like this.][Weather:Snowing]

[Name:Task_1_Start][Text:Wait, before we go could I get you to lend me a hand? I was looking for some $Item_227$. It's a magical herb and very useful for making rods. If you could look for a few for me, that'd be very helpful. If you can't find any, check again tomorrow. The land here is so fertile, I'm sure something new will have grown by then.]

[Name:Task_1_End][Text:You found some? Delightful! This will keep me stocked for a few days at least.
Town was this way you said? I'll see you there!]
[Name:Task_16_Start][Text:Not quite what I'd call a town, but it's a lovely start. Could I bother you to build a little something for me? Once that's done, I can get to work.][UnlockObjectID:22]
